name: TAKAMORI puzzle
description:
Introduction: A puzzle-story fan game about Calli & Kiara, TAKAMORI Forever!

Instructions: Click to interact

Made with: Unity 2021.3.1f1

Credits: 

Programming: 魚鬆

Art: BunnyGame

Translation: Angsty Eli

BGM & SE: https://www.springin.org/, PeriTune - YouTube

Note: 

1. Any bugs or advices are welcome to report!

2. I'll divide this game into 3 phases, the next update time would be on 2023/02(hopefully) add 2 episode, new puzzle mode, available on google play

2023/04 add 2 or 3 episode, available on appstore(if I can find a mac to build lol)

3. If you're interested at taking part in artist / writer / translator, feel free to contact me.

===

介紹：這是一個關於Calli和Kiara拼圖故事二創遊戲，TAKAMORI Forever!

說明：點擊來互動

Made with: Unity 2021.3.1f1

製作人員：

程式：魚鬆

繪圖：BunnyGame

翻譯：Angsty Eli, John Kang

BGM & SE: https://www.springin.org/, PeriTune - YouTube

備註：   

1. 歡迎回報任何壞蟲蟲跟建議！

2.我會把這個遊戲分成三部分更新，

下次更新會在2023/02(希望) 新增2篇故事、新拼圖模式、上架到google play

下下次更新在2023/04 新增2 ~ 3篇故事、上架到appstore(如果我有找到mac可以產版本的話 哈哈)

3. 如果你有興趣參與此遊戲開發(劇本、繪圖、翻譯)，歡迎聯絡我！
